_DOCUMENTATION.LimitingCollectionName: Name of the limiting collection. The limiting collection needs to be created first and should come before the limited collection in the list.
_DOCUMENTATION.CollectionFolder: IMPORTANT use double \ in folder path. Folder path to where the collection should be moved after creation
_DOCUMENTATION.CollectionType: 'Device' is the only supported type at the moment.

WQLQuerys.QueryName: Name of the first WQL query. The list can contain as many queries as needed.
WQLQuerys.Query: select * from SMS_R_System Where SMS_R_System.ResourceId  = '16555581'
select * from SMS_R_System Where SMS_R_System.ResourceId  = '16555599'

IncludeCollections: A list of collection names to be added as include collections
ExcludeCollections: A list of collection names to be added as exclude collections
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshType: Either: 'None', 'Continuous', 'Periodic' or 'Both'. 'None'= No schedule, best for direct membership collections. 'Continuous'= Incremental updates, best for OSD or root collections. 'Periodic'= Updates on a schedule. 'Both'= Incremental and schedule.
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshStartDate: Can either be empty to use the current date or a specific date in a supported date format for Cmdlet: 'New-CMCollection'
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshStartTime: Can either be empty to use the current time or a specific time in a supported time format for Cmdlet: 'New-CMCollection'
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshRecurInterval: Can either be: 'Minutes','Hours' or 'Days' and determines on what interval a collection should be refreshed. Will be irgnored if 'RefreshScheduleString' is set
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshRecurCount: Integer value for 'RefreshRecurInterval'. How many minutes or hours or days. Will be irgnored if 'RefreshScheduleString' is set
_DOCUMENTATION.RefreshScheduleString: A schedule string created with 'New-CMSchedule [schedule parameters] -ScheduleString'. If set 'RefreshStartTime', 'RefreshRecurInterval' and 'RefreshRecurCount' will be ignored.

ServiceWindows.Name: Name of a service / maintenance window. The list can contain as many service windows as needed
ServiceWindows.ScheduleString: A schedule string generated with 'New-CMSchedule'. Examples can be found in the: 'Maintenance Windows example schedules' section

ServiceWindows.Name: Every second day at 10AM for three hours. Software updates only
Every second Tuesday at 10AM for three hours. Any deployment type
